verbs.description: dorothy gilman [ARG1: the tightrope walker sleuthing] [V: is] [ARG2: the best therapy a woman who just in the very first stages of recovery from an awful early life finds a note hidden inside a hurdy - gurdy the note tells of another woman desperate struggle - and about the faceless ones who pressured her into signing something which is about to cost her her life] the note cuts off before she can twitter the tightrope walker rachel manija brown dorothy gilman amelia jones
